name: Generate Images from Prompts
description: Generate images using a text-to-image model from a set of user-provided prompts.

input_field.ui:help: Specify the field in the dataset that contains the queries (default: 'input')

tflabcustomui_docs.ui:help: Upload a .txt, .pdf, .json, or .jsonl file with one prompt per line or field.

image_width.ui:help: Width of each generated image in pixels.

image_height.ui:help: Height of each generated image in pixels.

images_per_prompt.ui:help: Number of images to generate for each prompt (1 to 8).

seed.ui:help: Random seed for reproducibility. Use -1 for a different result each time.

guidance_scale.ui:help: How strongly the model follows the prompt. Higher values enforce tighter adherence.

num_inference_steps.ui:help: Number of diffusion steps. More steps can improve quality but increase generation time.

prompt_column.ui:help: Specify which column contains the main prompts for generation.

negative_prompt_column.ui:help: Specify the column name for negative prompts. Leave empty if not using negative prompts.

prompt_postfix.ui:help: Optional postfix to append to every prompt before generation.
